title: Background Image Generator
generateImageTooltip: Generate images using the same prompt
generateWithNewPromptTooltip: Generates a unique prompt for each image
uniquePromptCountTooltip: Number of images to generate, each with a unique prompt
samePromptCountTooltip: Number of images to generate using the same prompt
helperMessage: You can use your custom lyrics and album art here or press "Thêm phụ đề" and fetch from Genius
